page.title: 10ATTITUDES
page.content: Some ways of improving the area were suggested.One of the main ones being the provision of a playground for children. It is also felt that more could be done for the employment of young people so that they do not have to travel away from the area. Many people suggested that the bus service could be much more efficient. Traffic on the narrow country lanes can be quite heavy and many would like a speed restriction put on all vehicles.The surface of the roads caused some concern and some dangerous corners needed widening. Occasionally low flying aircraft disturb the peace and frighten people and animals,and these should be stopped. Others felt that the preservation of the Welsh way of life and culture was vital and people moving into the area should be made aware of this.
